prod_desc: Help get LEGO® City's mail on the helicopter!
prod_long_desc:
Join the LEGO® City postal workers, featuring a helicopter with spinning main and tail rotors and storage boxes that open, plus 2 hand trucks, a gasoline barrel, mailbox and 3 pieces of mail. Includes 4 minifigures.
Includes 4 minifigures: a female postal worker, male postal worker, pilot and airport service worker.
Features a helicopter with spinning rotors, space for a minifigure and storage boxes that open.
Accessory elements include a gasoline barrel, 2 hand trucks, mailbox, wrench, 3 pieces of mail and 2 lights.
Open the front of the mailbox to empty the mail onto the hand truck.
Open the storage boxes on the side of the helicopter to load the mail for transport.
Spin the rotors and get ready to takeoff, after fueling up the helicopter with the gasoline barrel.
This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 5 and over.
Helicopter measures over 2” high, 5” long and 1” wide.
Mailbox measures over 1” high.
